168.heading: Dearness.

169.title: DearS
169.author: Peach-Pit ; translation, Christine Schilling.
notes: Originally published in Tokyo, Japan by Media Works, Inc. : 2002.
Author entered as: Momo no Tane.
"The DearS are an extraterrestrial race who have crash-landed on Earth and are now working with humans to become part of society
by going to high school! Takeya, a lonely high school student discovers the girl of his dreams when one of the DearS enrolls in his school."
